<h3>ğŸµ <a href="https://github.com/Melodia-ID2">MelodÃ­a</a> â€“ Mobile Music Streaming Platform</h3>

<p>
  Full-stack music streaming platform with React Native mobile app, React web backoffice, and 11 backend microservices.
</p>

<ul>
  <li><strong>Tech:</strong> Go (Gin), Python (FastAPI), React Native + Expo Router, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Typesense, Cloudinary, Firebase Cloud Messaging, Docker, Google Cloud Run</li>
  <li>11 independent microservices serving 120+ REST API endpoints with JWT auth and Google OAuth</li>
  <li>Implemented playlist & catalog management, social features, real-time search, AI-powered recommendations, and background job processing</li>
  <li>Containerized deployment with Docker on GCP Cloud Run with focus on scalability and observability</li>
</ul>

<h3>ğŸ›°ï¸ <a href="https://github.com/flopeztancredi/rust-distributed-airline-system">AerolÃ­neas RÃºsticas</a> â€“ Distributed Database Engine in Rust</h3>

<p>
  Cassandra-inspired distributed database implemented from scratch in Rust as an academic project.
</p>

<ul>
  <li>Peer-to-peer ring architecture with Gossip protocol for membership and failure detection</li>
  <li>Consistent hashing for data distribution, configurable replication, and tunable consistency levels</li>
  <li>Read-repair mechanisms and automatic node failure handling for fault tolerance</li>
  <li>Includes flight simulator client and real-time visualization GUI for monitoring distributed operations</li>
</ul>
